casebody.data:
STATE
v.
CRAIG 2018-0146 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 5, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

Sua sponte, parties ordered to file simultaneous, supplemental briefs that address (1) whether this matter is moot and (2) whether an exception to mootness is applicable. Both parties shall file their supplemental briefs within ten days. No requests or stipulations for extension of time are permitted. KENNEDY, J., dissents.

THOMAS A. TEODOSIO, J., of the Ninth District Court of Appeals, sitting for FISCHER, J.
